name: @commercetools/sdk-middleware-http
description: Middleware for http requests, to use with @commercetools/sdk-client
author: Nicola Molinari <nicola.molinari@commercetools.com> (https://github.com/emmenko)

scripts.build: cross-env npm run build:umd && npm run build:umd:min && npm run build:es && npm run build:cjs
scripts.build:umd: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f umd -n CommercetoolsSdkMiddlewareHttp -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-sdk-middleware-http.umd.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f umd -n CommercetoolsSdkMiddlewareHttp -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-sdk-middleware-http.umd.min.js
scripts.build:es: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f es -n CommercetoolsSdkMiddlewareHttp -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-sdk-middleware-http.es.js
scripts.build:cjs: cross-env NODE_ENV=rollup rollup -c ../../rollup.config.js -f cjs -n CommercetoolsSdkMiddlewareHttp -i src/index.js -o dist/commercetools-sdk-middleware-http.cjs.js
